title: Smile PreCure! - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Based on an Anime   Multiple POV   Multiple Protagonists   Short Story
author: Kobayashi Yuji
description:
Ten years have passed. Miyuki is a shop assistant at a bookstore, and Akane is working at her parents’ okonomiyaki shop.

Yayoi is a popular manga artist, Nao is a soccer team coach, and Reika is a teacher at a middle school.

Five girls are seemingly living peaceful days at first glance, however, they began to realise something is wrong with this world.

That…is the Story of Despair crafted by Joker…>
